name: The Last Service Ticket
description:
For the 'My First Game Jam' Jam 2021

You are the last IT guy on this doomed planet.  You just backed up the last database and now it is time to escape on this rickety old thrust pod.  Get to the upper atmosphere to escape on the shuttle.  Stop along the way to refuel on platforms.  Sidewalls equal death.  Land on a platform or ground too hard you die as well.

Controls

Z = Left Thruster

X = Center Thruster

C = Right Thruster

R = Reset
